title: Instagram Clone
description: A social media platform clone with features like posts, likes, comments, and authentication. Built using MERN stack with image uploads and responsive UI.

title: Blog App
description: A blogging platform where users can create, edit, and share blogs with markdown support and authentication.

title: Gap-Shap
description: A real-time chat application with one-to-one and group chat functionality using WebSockets.

title: Job Portal
description: A full-stack job portal built with MERN stack. Features authentication, job posting, applications, and advanced search filters.

title: Student Dashboard
description: A student dashboard built with React and Firebase for managing courses, assignments, and authentication.

title: Swiggy UI Clone
description: A responsive Swiggy UI clone built with React and TailwindCSS, showcasing modern design and layout.
